name: Akram Shuja
title: Senior Software Engineer
description: A design-minded developer with over a decade of experience in building enterprise applications using Java and related technologies. Highly adaptable to evolving tech stacks. Currently pursuing a Master's in AI and ML from BITS Pilani to expand expertise into cutting-edge domains.

highlights.title: HLD and LLD of complex projects
highlights.description: Expert in designing scalable architectures for complex projects, leveraging proven design patterns and best practices to ensure robustness, maintainability, and performance.

highlights.title: Full Stack Development
highlights.description: Extensive experience in server-side development and database architecture. Solid understanding of frontend workflows and seamless integration with RESTful APIs and microservices.

highlights.title: Problem Solving
highlights.description: Strong analytical skills and ability to solve complex technical challenges

highlights.title: Team Collaboration
highlights.description: Excellent communication skills and experience working in agile teams.
